Name: Icy Pink Lemonade
Ingredients: 20 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
45 ml Thomas Henry Soda Water chilled
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: Tangy, citrusy, fruity and refreshing - just not that butch.
Nutrition: One serving of Icy Pink Lemonade contains 199 calories
